name: VineStreetVinegarNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Vine St. Vinegar infuses raw, organic apple cider vinegar with fresh herbs, spices, hot peppers and anything else we can get our hands on. This Flash Briefing will update you each day with news, deals, what infusions are available, and where to find Vine St. Vinegar that week.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
